name: Positive Money
legal: Not for profit company limited by guarantee
goal:
Positive Money is a not-for-profit research and campaigning organisation aiming to make the money system more fair, democratic and sustainable. Our Brussels-based European wing is focusing on developing advocacy and research proposals dedicated for the Eurozone.

Although Positive Money's core focus is ton reform the financial system in the UK, we expanded our activities in December 2015 in the EU, in order to coordinate a campaign called ?Quantitative Easing campaign?.

In 2018, we are planning to launch "Positive Money Europe" as an official branch.

At the EU level our main goals are:
??Introduce a universal monetary dividend by the ECB
??Align the ECB policies with the EU's climate change goals and finance energy transition
??Introduction of central bank digital currencies in the Eurozone
??Reinforce the ECB's democratic accountability and transparency
??Reduce the banking system's ability to create money through credit


To achieve those objectives, Positive Money's activities include:

??Movement building with people from all background, skills and political views who want to work together to campaign for change.
??Influencing key decision makers and influencers in the European Union and at member states levels;
??Researching the problems with the money and banking system and develop policy proposals
interests: Climate Action, Economic and Financial Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union
